thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Chang Chun Eurasia Group in deal to buy 41.4 pct stake in Xining-based department store

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chang Chun Eurasia Group in deal to buy 41.4 pct stake in Xining-based department store

organizations.name: chang chun eurasia group co ltd

text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Chang Chun Eurasia Group Co Ltd :
* Says it enters into agreement to acquire 41.4 percent stake of shares in a Xining-based department store
* Co is holding a 49.04 percent stake in the Xining-based department store currently
* Transaction amount remains undetermined
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/ueCnGg
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
